Detailed Description

This file defines the dcsl_state_estimator node for state estimation of miabots.

Definition in file dcsl_miabot_state_estimator.cc.

Function Documentation

int main ( int  argc,
char **  argv 
)

main function called when the node is launched. Creates a MiabotStateEstimator object and initializes it based on initial position parameters. Callbacks are checked with ros::spinOnce() and state is propagated at a rate of around 25 Hz until program is interupted.
